Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher can give a more concise and inspirational comment on my work while AI is just a tool to summarize the errors detected from my work and report accordingly.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel more safe when I get feedback from my teacher as the teacher is the judge of my work. AI's feedbacks are informative but could not provide a sense of safety to the user.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher, as a human being, may misunderstand the needs of the student that provide only feedback from a niche perspective while AI is more all-rounded in the case.
